articles.title: Coachella: Youngest headline act Billie Eilish wows fans - PerthNow
articles.description: The American singer songwriter took to the stage donning an dramatic oversized jacket as she became the youngest headlining act in history.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish has officially become the youngest headlining act at Coachella Music Festival in history.
The 20-year-old star wowed fans with a breath-taking performance on Sunday afternoon at the Em… [+1534 chars]

articles.title: 'Fantastic Beasts' has less than magical opening weekend - CTV News
articles.description: 'Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore' got off to a less than magical start in its first weekend in U.S. and Canadian theatres. The third installment in the Harry Potter spinoff opened to US$43 million in North America, according to studio estimates Su…
